title: Creation: Sun, Moon, and Stars
description:
Readings from:

Genesis 1:14-19

Revelation 21:22-27

Today's passages were read by Trillia Newbell, the author of several books including Sacred Endurance, If God Is For Us, and God’s Very Good Idea; find her at trillianewbell.com.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
